$TTL 1h
@   IN SOA servidor.dorayaki.org. admin.dorayaki.org. (
        20250201 ; serial
        1h
        15m
        30d
        1h )

    IN NS servidor.dorayaki.org.

servidor    IN A 10.0.0.252
@           IN A 10.0.0.252
www         IN A 10.0.0.252
web         IN A 10.0.0.252
smtp        IN A 10.0.0.252
pop         IN A 10.0.0.252
imap        IN A 10.0.0.252
mail        IN A 10.0.0.252

@           IN MX 10 mail.dorayaki.org.
